body:
- Datapod frameworks

	- Datapod Central

			- Echo: https://echo.labstack.com
	- Edward's Personal Task Manager
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-Electron 0.0.0
		- offline program that manages personal tasks and projects
		- can publish static sites that show itemTypes
	- Edward's Good Arguments Site
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-Ruby-on-Rails 0.0.0
	- nnn

			- Datapod-for-T3-Stack 0.0.0
	- nnn
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-Haskell 0.0.0
		- uses the Yesod framework
	- nnn
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-Rust 0.0.0
		- uses the Actix framework
	- nnn
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-Clojure 0.0.0
		- uses the re-frame framework
	- nnn
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-Laravel 0.0.0
		- uses Vue.js for the frontend
	- nnn
		- genericizes
			- Datapod-for-ASP.NET-Core 0.0.0	
- supporting tools
	- hosting at https://www.koyeb.com/pricing (Go)
	- hosting at https://www.qovery.com/pricing/ (Go)

	- TypeScript; 4.8

	- https://uploadthing.com/
	- socket.io; 4.3
	- Go; 4.1; for CLIs
	- GraphQL; 3.5
	- Monorepos;2.9;https://frontendmasters.com/courses/monorepos/
		- https://turbo.build/
- CSS
	- find and copy features and layouts
	- mobile first
